p: A PLA2-like activity was clearly characterised in C. albicans CA98001, including cytosolic PLA2 (cPLA2) and secreted PLA2 activities. Indeed, using intact Candida cells, 53% and 34% of PLA2 activity was inhibited by 10 µM BpB and 8 g, respectively ( Table 2). In the case of 8 g, the impact on the production of arachidonic acid is marked (0.12 for 8 g versus 0.22 for the control).
